3986503129,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/business-intelligence-analyst-at-bnp-paribas-3986503129?position=49&pageNum=0&refId=fJayKDvI6HiwlDcYreKqQQ%3D%3D&trackingId=JUQC4mgYzllG%2BRePLjVUlg%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Business Intelligence Analyst,BNP Paribas,"Uccle, Brussels Region, Belgium","Leader du crédit à la consommation en Belgique et au Luxembourg, AlphaCredit fait partie du groupe BNP Paribas. De nos bureaux basés en face de la Gare Centrale de Bruxelles, nous proposons un éventail complet de solutions de crédit, par le biais de nos partenaires professionnels ou directement aux particuliers. AlphaCredit continue à se développer. C'est pourquoi nous sommes constamment à la recherche de nouveaux collègues dynamiques et désireux de grandir avec nous.
Pour le service Operations Strategy & Projects, nous sommes à la recherche d’un(e) collègue (m/f)
Au sein de l’équipe ‘Operations Strategy & Projects’ nous sommes à la recherche d’un BI-Analyst passionné par les données et les chiffres.

Au sein des Operations, le BI Analyst s’assure que les différentes business units reçoivent une bonne vue sur le fonctionnement des services a travers la data, et ceci grâce à des Rapports, Dashboard et des analyses de datas
Le BI Analyst s’assure que le management dispose de la data nécessaire de façon à ce qu’ils peuvent prendre les bonnes décisions tactiques et stratégiques
Vous fournissez les rapports récurrents pour nos partenaires des Operations interne et externe
Analyser des données pour éclaircir la vue sur des procès business

Comme BI Analyst vous êtes le point de contact pour toutes les questions BI avec un rapport aux Operations et ceci aussi bien pour les différents départements au sein des Operations que pour la maison mère BNP PARIBAS
Vous avez un esprit critique, analytique et logique
Vous avez de l’expérience avec la création des rapports et des Dashboards (via un outil BI comme BO, Cognos, …)
Vous disposez d’excellentes connaissances des applications Microsoft : Word, PowerPoint, Excel & Outlook
Vous parlez couramment le français ainsi que le néerlandais (à l'oral et à l'écrit) et disposez d'une bonne connaissance de l'anglais
Vous êtes précis(e) et organisé(e) dans votre travail
Vous faites preuve d'un réel esprit d'équipe, et travaillez de façon autonome et ciblée
Nous vous offrons un emploi passionnant dans une entreprise en pleine expansion.

Nous vous offrons un contrat à durée indéterminée et un salaire compétitif, assorti d'un bonus lié aux performances et d'un large éventail d’avantages extralégaux (assurances, chèques-repas, jours de congé extralégaux,...).

AlphaCredit continue à se développer. C'est pourquoi nous sommes constamment à la recherche de nouveaux collègues dynamiques et désireux de grandir avec nous.

3981213337,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/business-data-analyst-at-cp2-digital-3981213337?position=50&pageNum=0&refId=fJayKDvI6HiwlDcYreKqQQ%3D%3D&trackingId=z2zdNHLWzoRJ0IBv%2BweP2A%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Business/Data Analyst,CP2 Digital,"Hove, Flemish Region, Belgium","Join CP2 Digital as a Business/Data Analyst and play a pivotal role in revolutionizing the European e-commerce landscape for premium car parts. As a new and innovative e-commerce initiative, CP2 Digital is committed to delivering an unmatched digital shopping experience for car enthusiasts, mechanics, and independent automotive professionals. Join CP2 Digital as a Business/Data Analyst to drive innovation in e-commerce auto parts. Shape our multi-channel strategy and deliver excellence across Europe. Apply now!

Join CP2 Digital as a Business/Data Analyst and play a pivotal role in revolutionizing the European e-commerce landscape for premium car parts. As a new and innovative e-commerce initiative, CP2 Digital is committed to delivering an unmatched digital shopping experience for car enthusiasts, mechanics, and independent automotive professionals. Backed by a strategic partner, we aim to connect our customers with high-quality auto parts through a multi-platform strategy.

Our vision is to redefine automotive care by giving car enthusiasts seamless access to premium solutions.

At CP2 Digital, you will be part of a passionate team dedicated to excellence, continuous growth, and innovation. Embrace the opportunity to contribute to a company that values accountability, creativity, and integrity, while driving the future of the automotive parts industry.

Tasks

Responsibilities

  • Gather, analyze, and interpret data from various sources to identify trends, patterns, and insights relevant to the eCommerce platform.
  • Collaborate with the Product Lead and other stakeholders to define key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics for measuring product success.
  • Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities for product innovation and differentiation.
  • Support the Product Lead in defining and prioritizing product features, user stories, and acceptance criteria based on data-driven insights.
  • Work closely with the technical team to ensure data integrity, consistency, and accuracy in reporting and analysis.
  • Develop and maintain dashboards, reports, and visualization tools to communicate insights and recommendations to stakeholders.
  • Assist in the development and execution of A/B tests and experiments to optimize user experience and conversion rates.
  • Provide ad-hoc analysis and support to cross-functional teams to address business questions and challenges.
  • Collaborate with UX/UI designers, developers, testers, and marketers to ensure alignment of data insights with product development and marketing strategies.
  • Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in eCommerce and data analytics, and share knowledge and expertise with the team.


Requirements

Qualifications

  • Bachelor's or (preferably) master’s degree in business Analytics, Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as a Business/Data Analyst in an eCommerce _ environment, preferably within a start-up, scale-up, or SMB setting.
  • Strong analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques (e.g., SQL, Python, R, Excel, Power BI, Tableau).
  • Solid understanding of eCommerce concepts and principles, with a passion for delivering exceptional user experiences.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to translate data insights into actionable recommendations.
  • Ability to work autonomously and take initiative, while also thriving in a collaborative team environment.- Experience with agile methodologies and tools, particularly JIRA and Confluence, is a plus
  • Regular presence (3 days per week) in the Antwerp (Belgium) office is a pre-requisite.


Benefits

An attractive salary package

  • Fringe benefits
  • Company car
  • Flexible working hours and hybrid working
  • Green working environment
  • High-performing team of experts to learn from
  • A work hard, play hard environment, combining work with fun
  • Open and transparent leadership style


Join CP2 Digital as a Business/Data Analyst to drive innovation in e-commerce auto parts. Shape our multi-channel strategy and deliver excellence across Europe. Apply now!

3999751977,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-analytics-power-bi-at-carmeuse-3999751977?position=51&pageNum=0&refId=fJayKDvI6HiwlDcYreKqQQ%3D%3D&trackingId=i875nIVpMkFe%2FC4rDUjziQ%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data & Analytics (Power BI),Carmeuse,"Ottignies-Louvain-la-Neuve, Walloon Region, Belgium","Job Description

As our new Data & Analytics team member, you will drive the development of global consolidation and corporate performance management processes using Azure, MS-SQL, Tagetik, MDM, and Power BI Fabric technologies.
You also will collaborate closely with business stakeholders, bridging requirements to data modeling.
You will engage with Data Warehouse team throughout specifications, development, validation, and post-development support phases
column2: design and create new datasets and reports in Power BI Online and Excel.

column1: You will finally provide coaching and training to business users across various domains (Sales, Finance, HR, etc.) on Power BI Desktop and internal applications, and support end users in adopting new systems and consolidation workflows.
As the new Data & Analytics employee, your responsibilities will turn across different points:
You act as primary Power BI stakeholder for system development and enhancements
And collaborate with BI Manager and Business Owner(s) on corporate reporting functionalities
You also conduct technical and integration tests for new applications and programs.
You have to manage Power BI Online and MDM for all users (installation, configuration)
And also, document and update system procedures.
You enhance and maintain existing reports and processes
And analyze and implement new functionalities or reports.
You offer guidance, support, and coaching to users
Develop training documentation and conduct user training
And finally assist business owners in validating data and reports.
Bachelor’s Degree preferred, or equivalent combination of education, training, and experience
3+ years of MS-SQL and Power BI (or Equivalent Reporting) experience
Strong grasp of MS-SQL database management (Management Studio, Visual Studio)
Demonstrated experience in hands-on training for application/report users
Knowledge of Microsoft Azure and Data Warehouses environments
Familiarity with SAP (ECC, HCM, and BW)
Proficiency in understanding programming languages: SQL, DAX, and Python
You are a person well organized, reliable, who likes to support the business and building the bridges.
Experience with TimeXtender or equivalent data integration applications
Knowledge of Azure Data Factory and Microsoft Fabric
Knowledge of Standard API Integration workflows
Experience supporting or implementing a Master Data Management system, including data governance, business glossary, and metadata management tools.

The Data & Analytics team has the mission to empower our organization through data driven insights and analytics. In order to do this the team is in the process of building a robust and scalable modern data platform. Besides the current role, the team is composed of BI analysts, data engineers, system architects and business analysts for data governance. Geographically the team is based in the US and Belgium, its responsibilities extend to all parts of the Carmeuse Group globally. Working within our team you will be responsible to further develop and manage our corporate performance management tool used for financial consolidation, budgeting and planning.

Brian Culp, is the manager and has worked at Carmeuse since July 2020. He brings over a decade of experience in data management and reporting, along with 6+ years of expertise in Power BI. His deep understanding of commercial and industrial operations underscores the importance of consistent and accurate data consolidation. Brian’s leadership style is built on trust, integrity, and support. He is committed to creating a supportive and open atmosphere where individual contributions are valued, and professional growth is a priority. He actively encourages honest input from his team, fostering a collaborative environment that enhances efficiency and performance and ensures reliable and practical solutions for their internal customers.
As the recruitment process, what do you think of these steps:
Olivia Braszko, our Talent Acquisition Lead will analyze your Résumé and cover letter

A first ""Teams"" interview will be scheduled with Olivia. You will take 2 personality questionnaires. She will want to know more about you, as a person and as a professional. She will assess your motivations and answer to your questions
You will have a second interview with Brian Culp (our BI Manager) and Aurelie Mordant (our HRBP)
The last interview will take place with John Verkaik (our Group Data Analytics Director).
We truly believe that where you work matters and, as a family business, we know what makes our employees happy!
A strong HR and training policy to develop your skills
READY TO JOIN A ROCK-SOLID FAMILY?
Carmeuse started out as a small family-run business in Belgium.
Today it’s a leading global producer of lime, high calcium limestone and dolomitic stone. Its products are essential to energy producers, environmental services, construction and manufacturing.
With over 90 production facilities spread across almost every continent, and over 4,500 employees working at Carmeuse every day, the company’s most treasured resources are its people.

Carmeuse is dedicated to maintaining a workplace that fosters equal opportunity and creates a diverse and inclusive work environment. All qualified applicants will be considered for employment regardless of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, sexual orientation or gender identity. If you require particular assistance with any part of the application or hiring process due to a disability, you can submit your request by sending an email to hrsupport@carmeuse.com. This option is reserved for people requiring adaptation due to a disability. The information received will be processed by Carmeuse and then directed to a local recruiter who will provide assistance to ensure the proper consideration of the application or hiring process.

As the new Data &
column5:
Analytics employee, your responsibilities will turn across different points:

Projects:

  • You act as primary Power BI stakeholder for system development and enhancements
  • And collaborate with BI Manager and Business Owner(s) on corporate reporting functionalities
  • You also conduct technical and integration tests for new applications and programs.

System and Interfaces Support:

  • You have to manage Power BI Online and MDM for all users (installation, configuration)
  • Install and validate system updates
  • And also, document and update system procedures.

Application Support:

  • You enhance and maintain existing reports and processes
  • And analyze and implement new functionalities or reports.

Users Support:

  • You offer guidance, support, and coaching to users
  • Develop training documentation and conduct user training
  • And finally assist business owners in validating data and reports.

Your Profile

  • Bachelor’s Degree preferred, or equivalent combination of education, training, and experience
  • 3+ years of MS-SQL and Power BI (or Equivalent Reporting) experience
  • Strong grasp of MS-SQL database management (Management Studio, Visual Studio)
  • Demonstrated experience in hands-on training for application/report users
  • Knowledge of Microsoft Azure and Data Warehouses environments
  • Familiarity with SAP (ECC, HCM, and BW)
  • Proficiency in understanding programming languages: SQL, DAX, and Python
  • Fluent in English
  • Limited International travel required
  • You are a person well organized, reliable, who likes to support the business and building the bridges.

Preferred Experience:

  • Experience with TimeXtender or equivalent data integration applications
  • Knowledge of Azure Data Factory and Microsoft Fabric
  • Knowledge of Standard API Integration workflows
  • Experience supporting or implementing a Master Data Management system, including data governance, business glossary, and metadata management tools.

The Data &
column6:

The Data &
column7:
Analytics team has the mission to empower our organization through data driven insights and analytics. In order to do this the team is in the process of building a robust and scalable modern data platform. Besides the current role, the team is composed of BI analysts, data engineers, system architects and business analysts for data governance. Geographically the team is based in the US and Belgium, its responsibilities extend to all parts of the Carmeuse Group globally. Working within our team you will be responsible to further develop and manage our corporate performance management tool used for financial consolidation, budgeting and planning.

You Future Manager

Brian Culp, is the manager and has worked at Carmeuse since July 2020. He brings over a decade of experience in data management and reporting, along with 6+ years of expertise in Power BI. His deep understanding of commercial and industrial operations underscores the importance of consistent and accurate data consolidation. Brian’s leadership style is built on trust, integrity, and support. He is committed to creating a supportive and open atmosphere where individual contributions are valued, and professional growth is a priority. He actively encourages honest input from his team, fostering a collaborative environment that enhances efficiency and performance and ensures reliable and practical solutions for their internal customers.

The Recruitment Process:

As the recruitment process, what do you think of these steps:

  • Olivia Braszko, our Talent Acquisition Lead will analyze your Résumé and cover letter
  • A first ""Teams"" interview will be scheduled with Olivia. You will take 2 personality questionnaires. She will want to know more about you, as a person and as a professional. She will assess your motivations and answer to your questions
  • You will have a second interview with Brian Culp (our BI Manager) and Aurelie Mordant (our HRBP)
  • The last interview will take place with John Verkaik (our Group Data Analytics Director).

Why Carmeuse?

We truly believe that where you work matters and, as a family business, we know what makes our employees happy!

  • Permanent
  • Flexible working hours
  • Home working policy
  • Competitive salary package and benefits
  • A lot of growing possibilities
  • A strong HR and training policy to develop your skills
  • Work life balance.

About Us

READY TO JOIN A ROCK-SOLID FAMILY?

Carmeuse started out as a small family-run business in Belgium.

Today it’s a leading global producer of lime, high calcium limestone and dolomitic stone. Its products are essential to energy producers, environmental services, construction and manufacturing.

With over 90 production facilities spread across almost every continent, and over 4,500 employees working at Carmeuse every day, the company’s most treasured resources are its people.

Carmeuse is dedicated to maintaining a workplace that fosters equal opportunity and creates a diverse and inclusive work environment. All qualified applicants will be considered for employment regardless of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, sexual orientation or gender identity. If you require particular assistance with any part of the application or hiring process due to a disability, you can submit your request by sending an email to hrsupport@carmeuse.com. This option is reserved for people requiring adaptation due to a disability. The information received will be processed by Carmeuse and then directed to a local recruiter who will provide assistance to ensure the proper consideration of the application or hiring process.

3997273878,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/bi-analyst-reporting-sql-power-bi-at-ntt-data-europe-latam-3997273878?position=56&pageNum=0&refId=fJayKDvI6HiwlDcYreKqQQ%3D%3D&trackingId=LUt%2BAq60116fNdVAgKd1xA%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,BI analyst - Reporting/ SQL/ Power BI,NTT DATA Europe & Latam,"Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium","NTT DATA is currently looking for BI analyst for a public company in Brussels. This role can be performed hybrid between the office and homeworking.
This role involves curating and analysing data for the client departments of the Business Intelligence team.
Conduct an in-depth analysis of inquiries posed by the business, discerning the core queries requiring attention. Delve into historical questions that could be interconnected with the fresh inquiry
Evaluate existing models to draft a preliminary version of requested models
Formulate queries essential for model construction and subsequently validate their efficacy in addressing the posed questions
A good knowledge in methodology and terminology of dimensional modelling (Kimball)
Some knowledge in SQL (SQLServer and Oracle)
Some experience with the Microsoft BI suite (SSIS, SSAS, SSRS)
Previous experience in the public sector and/or social security is an important asset.

NTT DATA - a part of NTT Group - is a trusted global innovator of IT and business services headquartered in Tokyo. We help clients transform through consulting, industry solutions, business process services, IT modernization and managed services. NTT DATA enables clients, as well as society, to move confidently into the digital future. We are committed to our clients' long-term success and combine global reach with local client attention to serve them in over 50 countries. NTT DATA has been awarded Top Employer 2024 regional certification in Asia Pacific, Europe, Latin America, and North America including 29 countries. Visit us at nttdata.com

NTT DATA is currently looking for BI analyst for a public company in Brussels. This role can be performed hybrid between the office and homeworking.

Role

This role involves curating and analysing data for the client departments of the Business Intelligence team.

The main tasks will be :

  • Conduct an in-depth analysis of inquiries posed by the business, discerning the core queries requiring attention. Delve into historical questions that could be interconnected with the fresh inquiry
  • Evaluate existing models to draft a preliminary version of requested models
  • Formulate queries essential for model construction and subsequently validate their efficacy in addressing the posed questions
  • Test new queries

The candidate have

  • A good knowledge in methodology and terminology of dimensional modelling (Kimball)
  • A good knowledge in PowerBI
  • Some knowledge in SQL (SQLServer and Oracle)
  • Some experience with the Microsoft BI suite (SSIS, SSAS, SSRS)

Previous experience in the public sector and/or social security is an important asset.

Language

Dutch, French, English

NTT DATA - a part of NTT Group - is a trusted global innovator of IT and business services headquartered in Tokyo. We help clients transform through consulting, industry solutions, business process services, IT modernization and managed services. NTT DATA enables clients, as well as society, to move confidently into the digital future. We are committed to our clients' long-term success and combine global reach with local client attention to serve them in over 50 countries. NTT DATA has been awarded Top Employer 2024 regional certification in Asia Pacific, Europe, Latin America, and North America including 29 countries. Visit us at nttdata.com

3987885271,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-analist-at-dark-light-data-bi-consultancy-3987885271?position=57&pageNum=0&refId=fJayKDvI6HiwlDcYreKqQQ%3D%3D&trackingId=uMGdkNWzcIpeIIicYwPHFg%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,DATA ANALIST,Dark Light - data & BI consultancy,"Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium","Dark Light, een gespecialiseerd staffing agency, is op zoek naar een getalenteerde Data Analist. Met een focus op data engineering, data analytics, data science, master data en data governance, zijn we toegewijd aan het vertalen van data naar bruikbare business inzichten. Onze missie is om bedrijven te helpen groeien door ze in contact te brengen met het beste talent voor hun specifieke behoeften.
Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het functioneel ontwerpen, structureren en organiseren van de ETL-processen in een datawarehouse.
Je zorgt voor de planning, implementatie en correcte uitvoering van de ETL-flows.
Je ontwerpt, implementeert en onderhoudt on-premise databases om efficiënte opslag, extractie en beheer van ziekenhuisdata te waarborgen.
Je helpt mee om de datakwaliteit te waarborgen en zo de nauwkeurigheid en betrouwbaarheid van de informatie in onze databases te garanderen.

Je werkt nauw samen met het team om onder andere grote datasets te analyseren en modelleren, en zo trends, patronen en inzichten te identificeren die het beleid en de besluitvorming binnen het ziekenhuis ondersteunen.
Je visualiseert complexe scenario's op een duidelijke manier en rapporteert deze aan diverse stakeholders binnen alle lagen van het ziekenhuis.
Je denkt mee over de juiste tools en strategieën die leiden tot efficiënte data-opvraging, rapportage en visualisatie in geavanceerde dashboards.
Je optimaliseert queries om de databaseprestaties te verbeteren en tijdige informatieverzameling te garanderen voor rapportage en analyses.
Je beschikt over relevante werkervaring in databasebeheer, data management en/of data-analyse.
Ervaring in de zorgsector is een pluspunt.
Je kunt data modelleren met tools zoals SQL, Python en R.
Je hebt ervaring met data visualisatietools zoals Tableau, PowerBI, ...
Je bent in staat om mensen te enthousiasmeren, informeren en ondersteunen
column2: je kunt je goed inleven in de behoeften van andere afdelingen en je hebt een sterke drang om samen te werken, wat zeer gewaardeerd wordt.

column1: Zeer sterke focus op work-life balance

Dark Light, een gespecialiseerd staffing agency, is op zoek naar een getalenteerde Data Analist. Met een focus op data engineering, data analytics, data science, master data en data governance, zijn we toegewijd aan het vertalen van data naar bruikbare business inzichten. Onze missie is om bedrijven te helpen groeien door ze in contact te brengen met het beste talent voor hun specifieke behoeften.

Taken

  • Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het functioneel ontwerpen, structureren en organiseren van de ETL-processen in een datawarehouse.
  • Je zorgt voor de planning, implementatie en correcte uitvoering van de ETL-flows.
  • Je ontwerpt, implementeert en onderhoudt on-premise databases om efficiënte opslag, extractie en beheer van ziekenhuisdata te waarborgen.
  • Je helpt mee om de datakwaliteit te waarborgen en zo de nauwkeurigheid en betrouwbaarheid van de informatie in onze databases te garanderen.
  • Je werkt nauw samen met het team om onder andere grote datasets te analyseren en modelleren, en zo trends, patronen en inzichten te identificeren die het beleid en de besluitvorming binnen het ziekenhuis ondersteunen.
  • Je visualiseert complexe scenario's op een duidelijke manier en rapporteert deze aan diverse stakeholders binnen alle lagen van het ziekenhuis.
  • Je denkt mee over de juiste tools en strategieën die leiden tot efficiënte data-opvraging, rapportage en visualisatie in geavanceerde dashboards.
  • Je optimaliseert queries om de databaseprestaties te verbeteren en tijdige informatieverzameling te garanderen voor rapportage en analyses.


Vereisten

  • Je beschikt over relevante werkervaring in databasebeheer, data management en/of data-analyse.
  • Ervaring in de zorgsector is een pluspunt.
  • Je kunt data modelleren met tools zoals SQL, Python en R.
  • Je hebt ervaring met data visualisatietools zoals Tableau, PowerBI, ...
  • Je bent in staat om mensen te enthousiasmeren, informeren en ondersteunen

Benefits

  • Zeer sterke focus op work-life balance
  • Talloze trainingsmogelijkheden

3996441841,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/business-intelligence-specialist-at-uni-systems-3996441841?position=59&pageNum=0&refId=fJayKDvI6HiwlDcYreKqQQ%3D%3D&trackingId=b0rK9aBwGbB7kEMNJc%2BStg%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Business Intelligence Specialist,Uni Systems,"Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium","At Uni Systems, we are working towards turning digital visions into reality. We are continuously growing and we are looking for a Business Intelligence Specialist to join our UniQue team.
The HR Data & Analytics team provides HR data and insights to support HR policies and decisions, enabling the successful implementation of the Digital Transformation and EU policies.
What will you be doing in this role?
Implement business rules in the HR Business Intelligence Data Warehouse
Develop and maintain ETL processes to ensure accurate and timely data integration from multiple sources
Create and maintain data marts and dimensional models, and the logic to keep these updated
Implement best practices to ensure the integrity of data with exception-handling routines
Development of custom applications, application components and database objects in support of information systems
Conduct performance tuning and optimization of the data warehouse environment
Develop and maintain data models to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval
Actively contribute to all aspects of the data project lifecycle including request intake and acknowledgement, project estimation, time-tracking, and prioritization of tasks
Participation in data governance initiatives to uphold data quality standards
Participation in technical and business meetings with IT and business stakeholders to identify data needs, clarify requirements, and implement solutions.
What will you be bringing to the team?
University degree in a relevant field.
At least 13 years of experience in a relevant field.
Excellent ability to analyse, model and interpret data
Experience working within an Agile/Scrum environment

Extensive Data Warehouse experience using SAP BODS (SAP Business Objects Data Services, Repository Manager, ETL Mapping/Transformations/Job Scheduling, Process Optimization), and Oracle DB. Working knowledge in other ETL / ELT tools is considered a plus
Working knowledge of a version control system such as Git
Excellent knowledge of Data Vault concepts
Deep experience in data quality applied to Data Warehouse / Data Vault
Experience of preparing FSD/TSD (Functional/Technical Specification Document) documents from BRD (Business Requirement Document) / Customer Requirements.
Extensive experience in designing and modelling using modelling tools like PowerDesigner
Thoroughly proficient in SQL, PL/SQL development in Oracle. Expertise in other programming languages such as Python or JavaScript is considered a big plus
Working knowledge in cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure or AWS
Experience with Microsoft Azure Cloud platform and related components, SQL Server on Azure, Azure Data Factory and Azure Synapse is considered a plus
A valid certification in a recognized quality assurance standard is considered a plus (i.e. ISTQB), certification in data and analytics testing is considered a plus (i.e. DAU-CDAT)
Fluency in English, French language knowledge is considered a plus.

At Uni Systems, we are providing equal employment opportunities and banning any form of discrimination on grounds of gender, religion, race, color, nationality, disability, social class, political beliefs, age, marital status, sexual orientation or any other characteristics. Take a look at our Diversity, Equality & Inclusion Policy for more information.

At Uni Systems, we are working towards turning digital visions into reality. We are continuously growing and we are looking for a Business Intelligence Specialist to join our UniQue team.

The HR Data &
column2:
Analytics team provides HR data and insights to support HR policies and decisions, enabling the successful implementation of the Digital Transformation and EU policies.

What will you be doing in this role?

  • Implement business rules in the HR Business Intelligence Data Warehouse
  • Develop and maintain ETL processes to ensure accurate and timely data integration from multiple sources
  • Create and maintain data marts and dimensional models, and the logic to keep these updated
  • Implement best practices to ensure the integrity of data with exception-handling routines
  • Development of custom applications, application components and database objects in support of information systems
  • Conduct performance tuning and optimization of the data warehouse environment
  • Develop and maintain data models to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval
  • Actively contribute to all aspects of the data project lifecycle including request intake and acknowledgement, project estimation, time-tracking, and prioritization of tasks
  • Participation in data governance initiatives to uphold data quality standards
  • Participation in technical and business meetings with IT and business stakeholders to identify data needs, clarify requirements, and implement solutions.


Requirements

What will you be bringing to the team?

  • University degree in a relevant field.
  • At least 13 years of experience in a relevant field.
  • Excellent ability to analyse, model and interpret data
  • Experience working within an Agile/Scrum environment
  • Extensive Data Warehouse experience using SAP BODS (SAP Business Objects Data Services, Repository Manager, ETL Mapping/Transformations/Job Scheduling, Process Optimization), and Oracle DB. Working knowledge in other ETL / ELT tools is considered a plus
  • Working knowledge of a version control system such as Git
  • Excellent knowledge of Data Vault concepts
  • Deep experience in data quality applied to Data Warehouse / Data Vault
  • Experience of preparing FSD/TSD (Functional/Technical Specification Document) documents from BRD (Business Requirement Document) / Customer Requirements.
  • Extensive experience in designing and modelling using modelling tools like PowerDesigner
  • Thoroughly proficient in SQL, PL/SQL development in Oracle. Expertise in other programming languages such as Python or JavaScript is considered a big plus
  • Working knowledge in cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure or AWS
  • Experience with Microsoft Azure Cloud platform and related components, SQL Server on Azure, Azure Data Factory and Azure Synapse is considered a plus
  • A valid certification in a recognized quality assurance standard is considered a plus (i.e. ISTQB), certification in data and analytics testing is considered a plus (i.e. DAU-CDAT)
  • Fluency in English, French language knowledge is considered a plus.

At Uni Systems, we are providing equal employment opportunities and banning any form of discrimination on grounds of gender, religion, race, color, nationality, disability, social class, political beliefs, age, marital status, sexual orientation or any other characteristics. Take a look at our Diversity, Equality &
column3: Inclusion Policy for more information.

3945419806,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/performance-data-analyst-f-m-at-candriam-3945419806?position=1&pageNum=2&refId=az7rgWVKcuwYZFmdAy2%2BBw%3D%3D&trackingId=3dZowPuGkFl%2FeIf9p55vag%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Performance & Data Analyst F/M,Candriam,"Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium","Position description
Operations, Data & IT - Operations, Client Servicing & Reporting

Candriam is a global multi-specialist asset manager and a recognized pioneer and leader in sustainable investment. For more than 25 years, Candriam has offered innovative and diversified investment solutions across many asset classes including fixed income, equities, absolute return , asset allocation and illiquid assets.

As a Responsible Employer, Equal Employment Opportunity is crucial to Candriam. We are committed to building the best global team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We provide an inclusive work environment and support wellbeing and work-life balance.

As a Performance & Data Analyst in our Performance Measurement team at Candriam, you are joining a global multi-specialist asset management firm renowned for its commitment to sustainable and responsible investments.

In this role, you will play a crucial part in ensuring the accuracy and integrity of our reporting data, essential for both external client reports and consumption by internal clients like the RFP team and Front Office.

Your work will encompass a broad spectrum of portfolio data relevant to our diverse investment solutions, including performance metrics, asset allocations, and holdings information. Your responsibilities will be pivotal in managing the performance engine's parameterization, overseeing the data flow process, and enhancing data quality.
This role is integral to feeding accurate and reliable data into our central data lake, supporting strategic decision-making and analysis across the company.
It requires a dedication to operational excellence and a proactive approach to developing your technical skills within the evolving landscape of sustainable asset management.
You collect data from different sources and integrate it into the performance calculation tool
You maintain the set-up of the production scope
You manage the output of performance results to serve all business needs
You actively contribute to specific projects on creating value added services for internal and external clients
You provide innovative insight in data related to regulatory and business challenges
You assess, design and implement solutions in data management, data governance and data quality
You analyze systems and processes to make them more efficient and to make data delivery faster and more accurate.
You hold a Master in finance, economics or you are preferably performance measurement and GIPS
You have excellent reporting & data management skills
A previous experience with a performance analysis tool is an asset (Statpro, Bisam, Factset,..)
You have an analytical mind that is capable of creative and solution-oriented thinking in a continuous search for improvement
You are efficient and work in a structured and methodical way
You have an eye for detail, you are meticulous and pragmatic
You are a motivated person that can work in a dynamical environment and face challenges

column2: Python skills required. knowledge of MS Access, VBA and SQL is an asset, Power BI skills are also a plus

3993530432,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/operationeel-data-analist-at-bpostgroup-3993530432?position=2&pageNum=2&refId=az7rgWVKcuwYZFmdAy2%2BBw%3D%3D&trackingId=n6fgFZI1XEmHU01%2BfnRmmQ%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Operationeel data-analist,bpostgroup,"Anderlecht, Brussels Region, Belgium","AMP, onderdeel van bpostgroup, is een toonaangevende Belgische distributeur van printmedia. Met vier logistieke sites bedient AMP 4.000 persverkooppunten in België en bereikt dagelijks meer dan een miljoen lezers.
Het hoofdkantoor bevindt zich in Anderlecht, met verdeelcentra in Jumet, Paal-Beringen, Lokeren en Mollem. Onze missie is het efficiënt en tijdig distribueren van publicaties voor uitgevers.
Als operationeel data-analist speel je een sleutelrol binnen het Circulation & Business Intelligence team.
Analyseren van verkoopdata voor efficiëntere distributiestrategieën en distributietrends
Administratieve opvolging en ad hoc wijzigingen afhandelen via de mailbox, inclusief distributieplanning en wijzigingen
Onderhouden van klant- en uitgeversrelaties, inclusief communicatie met klanten en uitgevers
Beheren, opvolgen en analyseren van verkoopcijfers met behulp van SAP, Excel en Word voor gegevensanalyse en rapportage naar dagbladhandelaars

Je werkt samen met een team van 7 collega's die je zullen opleiden en ondersteunen. Jouw rol is cruciaal voor de distributie van kranten en tijdschriften in België en Nederland. We zoeken iemand die zowel analytisch sterk als administratief vaardig is, met beperkte innovatie met nieuwe tools.

Talenkennis: Effectieve communicatie in zowel het Nederlands als het Frans is cruciaal voor het onderhouden van sterke relaties met klanten en collega's, en voor een vlot verloop van dagelijkse taken.
Passie voor data-analyse: Je hebt een sterke affiniteit met het analyseren van data en bent in staat om kritisch te denken, wat essentieel is voor het optimaliseren van distributieprocessen.
Sterk concentratievermogen: Met een sterk concentratievermogen beheer je nauwkeurig planningen en kun je flexibel omgaan met veranderingen in een dynamische omgeving.

Software pakketten: Je hebt ervaring met SAP, Excel en Word voor gedetailleerde data-analyses en het opstellen van rapporten, wat bijdraagt aan effectieve besluitvorming. Eventuele kennis van SAP kan ook intern worden bijgebracht.
Bachelor niveau of relevante ervaring: Een afgeronde bacheloropleiding of vergelijkbare ervaring is vereist in een soortgelijke functie.
Analytisch en nauwkeurig: Je beschikt over sterke analytische vaardigheden om complexe data te interpreteren en nauwkeurige beslissingen te nemen.
Ervaring in de persindustrie is een plus: Kennis van de persindustrie kan een voordeel zijn vanwege het inzicht in specifieke behoeften en uitdagingen binnen de sector.
Bij AMP bieden we een competitief salarispakket en een breed scala aan voordelen om zowel jouw professionele als persoonlijke leven te ondersteunen:
Aantrekkelijk salaris volgens PC200 barema, rekening houdend met jouw ervaring.
Maaltijdcheques ter waarde van 8 euro per dag.
Ecocheques ter waarde van 250 euro per jaar.
Individuele en op maat gemaakte taalcoaching indien nodig, om jouw vaardigheden in de andere landstaal te verbeteren.

AMP, onderdeel van bpostgroup, is een toonaangevende Belgische distributeur van printmedia. Met vier logistieke sites bedient AMP 4.000 persverkooppunten in België en bereikt dagelijks meer dan een miljoen lezers.


Het hoofdkantoor bevindt zich in Anderlecht, met verdeelcentra in Jumet, Paal-Beringen, Lokeren en Mollem. Onze missie is het efficiënt en tijdig distribueren van publicaties voor uitgevers.


Jouw functie


Als operationeel data-analist speel je een sleutelrol binnen het Circulation &
column2:
Business Intelligence team.


Taken en Verantwoordelijkheden


  • Analyseren van verkoopdata voor efficiëntere distributiestrategieën en distributietrends
  • Administratieve opvolging en ad hoc wijzigingen afhandelen via de mailbox, inclusief distributieplanning en wijzigingen
  • Onderhouden van klant- en uitgeversrelaties, inclusief communicatie met klanten en uitgevers
  • Beheren, opvolgen en analyseren van verkoopcijfers met behulp van SAP, Excel en Word voor gegevensanalyse en rapportage naar dagbladhandelaars



Werkomgeving

Je werkt samen met een team van 7 collega's die je zullen opleiden en ondersteunen. Jouw rol is cruciaal voor de distributie van kranten en tijdschriften in België en Nederland. We zoeken iemand die zowel analytisch sterk als administratief vaardig is, met beperkte innovatie met nieuwe tools.


Wat breng je mee?


Talenkennis: Effectieve communicatie in zowel het Nederlands als het Frans is cruciaal voor het onderhouden van sterke relaties met klanten en collega's, en voor een vlot verloop van dagelijkse taken.


Passie voor data-analyse: Je hebt een sterke affiniteit met het analyseren van data en bent in staat om kritisch te denken, wat essentieel is voor het optimaliseren van distributieprocessen.


Sterk concentratievermogen: Met een sterk concentratievermogen beheer je nauwkeurig planningen en kun je flexibel omgaan met veranderingen in een dynamische omgeving.


Software pakketten: Je hebt ervaring met SAP, Excel en Word voor gedetailleerde data-analyses en het opstellen van rapporten, wat bijdraagt aan effectieve besluitvorming. Eventuele kennis van SAP kan ook intern worden bijgebracht.


Bachelor niveau of relevante ervaring: Een afgeronde bacheloropleiding of vergelijkbare ervaring is vereist in een soortgelijke functie.


Analytisch en nauwkeurig: Je beschikt over sterke analytische vaardigheden om complexe data te interpreteren en nauwkeurige beslissingen te nemen.


Ervaring in de persindustrie is een plus: Kennis van de persindustrie kan een voordeel zijn vanwege het inzicht in specifieke behoeften en uitdagingen binnen de sector.


Ons aanbod


Bij AMP bieden we een competitief salarispakket en een breed scala aan voordelen om zowel jouw professionele als persoonlijke leven te ondersteunen:


  • Aantrekkelijk salaris volgens PC200 barema, rekening houdend met jouw ervaring.
  • Maaltijdcheques ter waarde van 8 euro per dag.
  • 20 wettelijke verlofdagen plus 2 extra dagen.
  • Thuiswerkvergoeding van 50 euro per maand.
  • 100% terugbetaling van het openbaar vervoer.
  • Ecocheques ter waarde van 250 euro per jaar.
  • Hospitalisatieverzekering.
  • Individuele en op maat gemaakte taalcoaching indien nodig, om jouw vaardigheden in de andere landstaal te verbeteren.

3988570244,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-anlayst-finance-background-at-halian-3988570244?position=4&pageNum=2&refId=az7rgWVKcuwYZFmdAy2%2BBw%3D%3D&trackingId=XBHxnInpCDcIRq4xgFdQoA%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Anlayst (finance background),Halian,"Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium","Job Title: Data Anlayst (finance background)

We are seeking a skilled Data Analyst with a strong finance background to join our team and work on the implementation of our new CRM system for the bank. The ideal candidate will have experience in finance, specifically as an accountant or auditor, and will be responsible for data transfer and integration.
Collaborate with the finance and IT teams to understand data requirements and ensure smooth data transfer during the CRM implementation.
Analyze and validate financial data to ensure accuracy and integrity.
Develop and maintain complex Excel spreadsheets, including pivot tables, data extraction, and VLOOKUP functions.
Utilize SQL and Python to manipulate and analyze data (preferred).
Ensure data quality and consistency throughout the migration process.
Generate reports and provide insights to support decision-making.
Communicate effectively in both French and English with internal and external stakeholders.
Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Data Analyst in the finance sector (accounting, auditing, etc.).
Strong proficiency in Excel, including pivot tables, data extraction, and VLOOKUP.
Familiarity with SQL and Python is a significant plus.
Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Bilingual proficiency in French and English is required.
Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Data Analytics, or a related field.
Opportunities for professional development and career growth.

To apply for the Data Analyst (Finance Background) position located in Brussels, please send your resume to [email protected]. Be sure to include the name of the position and location in the subject line of your email. We look forward to reviewing your application and exploring the possibility of you joining our dynamic team at Halian.
Data Anlayst (finance background) in brussels, NONE

Job Title: Data Anlayst (finance background)

Location: brussels, NONE

Employment Type:

Permanent

We are seeking a skilled Data Analyst with a strong finance background to join our team and work on the implementation of our new CRM system for the bank. The ideal candidate will have experience in finance, specifically as an accountant or auditor, and will be responsible for data transfer and integration.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with the finance and IT teams to understand data requirements and ensure smooth data transfer during the CRM implementation.
  • Analyze and validate financial data to ensure accuracy and integrity.
  • Develop and maintain complex Excel spreadsheets, including pivot tables, data extraction, and VLOOKUP functions.
  • Utilize SQL and Python to manipulate and analyze data (preferred).
  • Ensure data quality and consistency throughout the migration process.
  • Generate reports and provide insights to support decision-making.
  • Communicate effectively in both French and English with internal and external stakeholders.

Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Data Analyst in the finance sector (accounting, auditing, etc.).
  • Strong proficiency in Excel, including pivot tables, data extraction, and VLOOKUP.
  • Familiarity with SQL and Python is a significant plus.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Bilingual proficiency in French and English is required.

Education:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Data Analytics, or a related field.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
  • Friendly and collaborative work environment.

To apply for the Data Analyst (Finance Background) position located in Brussels, please send your resume to [email protected]. Be sure to include the name of the position and location in the subject line of your email. We look forward to reviewing your application and exploring the possibility of you joining our dynamic team at Halian.

Data Anlayst (finance background) in brussels, NONE

De nos bureaux basés en face de la Gare Centrale de Bruxelles, nous proposons un éventail complet de solutions de crédit, par le biais de nos partenaires professionnels ou directement aux particuliers. AlphaCredit continue à se développer. C'est pourquoi nous sommes constamment à la recherche de nouveaux collègues dynamiques et désireux de grandir avec nous.
Pour le service Operations Strategy & Projects, nous sommes à la recherche d’un(e) collègue (m/f)
Au sein de l’équipe ‘Operations Strategy & Projects’ nous sommes à la recherche d’un BI-Analyst passionné par les données et les chiffres.

Au sein des Operations, le BI Analyst s’assure que les différentes business units reçoivent une bonne vue sur le fonctionnement des services a travers la data, et ceci grâce à des Rapports, Dashboard et des analyses de datas
Le BI Analyst s’assure que le management dispose de la data nécessaire de façon à ce qu’ils peuvent prendre les bonnes décisions tactiques et stratégiques
Vous fournissez les rapports récurrents pour nos partenaires des Operations interne et externe
Analyser des données pour éclaircir la vue sur des procès business

Comme BI Analyst vous êtes le point de contact pour toutes les questions BI avec un rapport aux Operations et ceci aussi bien pour les différents départements au sein des Operations que pour la maison mère BNP PARIBAS
Vous avez un esprit critique, analytique et logique
Vous avez de l’expérience avec la création des rapports et des Dashboards (via un outil BI comme BO, Cognos, …)
Vous disposez d’excellentes connaissances des applications Microsoft : Word, PowerPoint, Excel & Outlook
Vous parlez couramment le français ainsi que le néerlandais (à l'oral et à l'écrit) et disposez d'une bonne connaissance de l'anglais
Vous êtes précis(e) et organisé(e) dans votre travail
Vous faites preuve d'un réel esprit d'équipe, et travaillez de façon autonome et ciblée
Nous vous offrons un emploi passionnant dans une entreprise en pleine expansion.

Nous vous offrons un contrat à durée indéterminée et un salaire compétitif, assorti d'un bonus lié aux performances et d'un large éventail d’avantages extralégaux (assurances, chèques-repas, jours de congé extralégaux,...).

3994539721,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/business-system-analyst-at-fujitsu-3994539721?position=8&pageNum=2&refId=az7rgWVKcuwYZFmdAy2%2BBw%3D%3D&trackingId=QkX710sOF9WNxpHVlqyyNA%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Business System Analyst,Fujitsu,"Brussels Region, Belgium","Kickstart 2025 with a new career opportunity In Brussels!
Contract Type: Freelance/B2B or Employee - you decide!
Analyses organisation requirements and specifies business, software and system requirements for new ICT solutions.
• Analyse existing systems and business models
• Provide consolidate findings on components or processes
• Maps and documents interfaces between legacy and new systems
• Good knowledge of analysis/modelling tools and techniques (use case diagram, state diagram, entity relationship model, …).
• Strong capacity in preparing and writing (business) analysis.
• Strong capacity to give high level and technical presentations

Kickstart 2025 with a new career opportunity In Brussels!


Location: Brussels


Contract Type: Freelance/B2B or Employee - you decide!


Start Date: Q1 / Q2 2025


Education: Secondary School


Profile: European Passport holder


Business/Systems Analyst (BSA)

Analyses organisation requirements and specifies business, software and system requirements for new ICT solutions.


Nature of the tasks

• Analyse existing systems and business models

• Recommend resolutions and improvements

• Provide integrated solutions

• Provide consolidate findings on components or processes

• Author technical performance requirements

• Ensure security by design

• Maps and documents interfaces between legacy and new systems


Knowledge and skills

• Good knowledge of analysis/modelling tools and techniques (use case diagram, state diagram, entity relationship model, …).

• UML, BPMN 2.0 (Business Modelling).

• Strong capacity in preparing and writing (business) analysis.

• Strong capacity to give high level and technical presentations

3985693548,https://be.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-business-analyst-at-sander-technology-3985693548?position=10&pageNum=2&refId=az7rgWVKcuwYZFmdAy2%2BBw%3D%3D&trackingId=i5zltV0YImy%2Fr2w3F57I8g%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Data Business Analyst,Sander Technology,"Brussels, Brussels Region, Belgium","Our partner reaches hundreds of millions of people worldwide every day with their products and services, enhancing cityscapes. They are ambitious and seek passionate individuals to contribute to their innovative ideas.

For over 50 years, our partner has focused on developing cutting-edge, advertising-funded solutions like bus shelters and digital airport displays. Operating in over 80 countries, they have a team of over 13,000 employees, including 300 in Belgium-Luxembourg.
Our client is committed to creating smarter, more connected, and sustainable cities, guided by strong values of collaboration and an ambitious climate strategy.
Currently, our partner is seeking new skills to innovate together as an IT Business Analyst.
Understanding and documenting business requirements in detail, collaborating with stakeholders.
Analyzing business needs for Business Intelligence (BI) purposes.
Identifying areas for improvement to enhance productivity and reduce costs effectively.
Managing change impacts and planning necessary implementations.
Providing regular project progress reports, working closely with stakeholders and the IT Director.
Proficiency in both French and Dutch (spoken and written is a plus not a must)
Strong initiative, proactive mindset, and deep understanding of business needs
Project-oriented analytical skills, risk anticipation, and excellent communication abilities
Decision-making skills, stress resilience, and ability to multitask with minimal supervision
In-depth knowledge of IT architectures, market development tools and methods
Operational IT knowledge, particularly in Business Intelligence (BI), is a plus
Familiarity with Microsoft BI tools (SSIS, SSRS, SSAS) and SQL is advantageous
Practical experience with Power BI is a bonus
Native Dutch + intermediate French or English
Attractive salary package including extralegal benefits such as hospitalization and group insurance
Car + fuel card or mobility budget (650eur NET)

Our partner reaches hundreds of millions of people worldwide every day with their products and services, enhancing cityscapes. They are ambitious and seek passionate individuals to contribute to their innovative ideas.

For over 50 years, our partner has focused on developing cutting-edge, advertising-funded solutions like bus shelters and digital airport displays. Operating in over 80 countries, they have a team of over 13,000 employees, including 300 in Belgium-Luxembourg.

Our client is committed to creating smarter, more connected, and sustainable cities, guided by strong values of collaboration and an ambitious climate strategy.

Currently, our partner is seeking new skills to innovate together as an IT Business Analyst.

Role

  • Understanding and documenting business requirements in detail, collaborating with stakeholders.
  • Analyzing business needs for Business Intelligence (BI) purposes.
  • Identifying areas for improvement to enhance productivity and reduce costs effectively.
  • Managing change impacts and planning necessary implementations.
  • Providing regular project progress reports, working closely with stakeholders and the IT Director.

Profile

  • Proficiency in both French and Dutch (spoken and written is a plus not a must)
  • 3-10 years of experience
  • Strong initiative, proactive mindset, and deep understanding of business needs
  • Project-oriented analytical skills, risk anticipation, and excellent communication abilities
  • Decision-making skills, stress resilience, and ability to multitask with minimal supervision
  • In-depth knowledge of IT architectures, market development tools and methods
  • Operational IT knowledge, particularly in Business Intelligence (BI), is a plus
  • Familiarity with Microsoft BI tools (SSIS, SSRS, SSAS) and SQL is advantageous
  • Practical experience with Power BI is a bonus
  • Native Dutch + intermediate French or English

Offer

  • 48.000eur - 70.000eur yearly salary
  • Attractive salary package including extralegal benefits such as hospitalization and group insurance
  • 32days of legal holidays per year
  • Hybrid working system
  • Car + fuel card or mobility budget (650eur NET)
  • Representation fee
  • Bonus

3995318402,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/analista-de-dados-pleno-at-safra-3995318402?position=2&pageNum=0&refId=X84chee5MOJlSD5x5MMKig%3D%3D&trackingId=K3vkB1xFWw0QdTbnS4guXg%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Analista de Dados Pleno,Safra,"São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil","A área de Plataformas e Data Science é responsável pela transformação e disponibilização de dados e/ou análises para apoiar tomadas de decisão das equipes de Prevenção à Lavagem de Dinheiro (PLD) e Pesquisa e Validação Patrimonial (PVP). Monitoramento e estudos de pessoas e empresas, clientes ou não do Banco Safra, para suporte à negociação de ativos e prevenção à lavagem de dinheiro e/ou financiamento ao terrorismo através de modelos matemáticos.
Desenvolver e dar manutenção nos workflows em ferramentas de Sharepoint.

J. Safra Clube (descontos em farmácias, lazer, bem estar e saúde, educação, colônia de férias no litoral Sul de São Paulo).

A área de Plataformas e Data Science é responsável pela transformação e disponibilização de dados e/ou análises para apoiar tomadas de decisão das equipes de Prevenção à Lavagem de Dinheiro (PLD) e Pesquisa e Validação Patrimonial (PVP). Monitoramento e estudos de pessoas e empresas, clientes ou não do Banco Safra, para suporte à negociação de ativos e prevenção à lavagem de dinheiro e/ou financiamento ao terrorismo através de modelos matemáticos.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

  • Desenvolver e dar manutenção nos workflows em ferramentas de Sharepoint.
  • Desenvolver e dar manutenção em relatórios executivos e gerenciais de PVP e PLD.
  • Processar e desenvolver rotinas periódicas de tratamento de dados.
  • Processar e desenvolver regras e modelos de PLD e PVP.


Requisitos e qualificações

  • Indispensável: SQL, Python, Power BI.
  • Pacote Office (Sharepoint, Power Automate, Excel), Git.
  • Perfil analítico, com conhecimento em tratamentos de dados, lógica de programação e estatística.


Informações adicionais

  • Trilhas de capacitação acadêmica e técnica

3991536452,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/analista-de-dados-jr-opera%C3%A7%C3%B5es-financeiras-at-banco-pan-3991536452?position=3&pageNum=0&refId=X84chee5MOJlSD5x5MMKig%3D%3D&trackingId=eMmHaheSk0n6R3PjvXLhMw%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Analista de Dados Jr. - Operações Financeiras,Banco PAN,"São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil","Somos o PAN

Ágeis, flexíveis e criativos, exploramos possibilidades com disposição e desejo de fazer acontecer. Sempre prontos para encarar novos desafios, nutrimos líderes que, além de ter garra, são abertos e empáticos, veem na proximidade das relações, o elo entre cada um.

Nossa missão, se faz cumprida quando transformamos a vida dos outros através dos nossos conhecimentos. Nossos pilares de cultura, reforçam nossa postura idealizadora e com desejo de fazer acontecer: T rabalho em equipe, O usadia empreendedora e P rotagonismo com profundidade.
Dominamos nossos processos e trazemos melhorias para quem deseja ter uma vida financeira mais inteligente.
Coletar e limpar dados financeiros de diversas fontes, incluindo bancos de dados internos e externos
Realizar consultas SQL para extrair informações relevantes
Criar dashboards e relatórios executivos usando ferramentas como Tableau
Colaborar com equipes multidisciplinares para identificar tendências, anomalias e oportunidades de otimização de processos
Auxiliar em solicitações de dados ad hoc e contribuir para projetos em andamento.
Quais as principais competências para a posição?
Formação superior completa: preferencialmente em Engenharia, Ciência da Computação, Estatística, Economia ou áreas relacionadas
Experiência Técnica: conhecimento moderado ou avançado em SQL para extração e manipulação de dados
Habilidades Essenciais: Raciocínio lógico, capacidade analítica e criatividade na busca por soluções
Comunicação Efetiva: Boa comunicação e habilidades para argumentação técnica e de negócios.
Criação de Dashboards e Visualizações: Habilidade em criar dashboards e visualizações para acompanhamento de KPIs (Tableau)
Conhecimento em Cloud: Desejável experiência com plataformas como AWS e Azure
Análise de Jornadas de Produtos: Experiência em analisar jornadas de produtos, estudar comportamentos e classificar dados
Conhecimento em produtos financeiros (por exemplo, cartão, conta corrente, consignado)
Curiosidade e vontade de aprender e crescer em um ambiente orientado por dados.
Modelo de atuação: Híbrido (4 dias presencial no escritório e 1 dia de home office)
Convênio Médico (internação em apartamento para titular e dependentes) 🏥
Descontos em mais de 10 mil farmácias 💊
Licença familiar estendida (Responsável 6 meses e corresponsável 30 dias) 👨‍🍼🤱
Auxílio tecnologia assistivas (reembolso de 85% para colaboradores com deficiência) 🦻🦽
Programa de reconhecimento por tempo de casa 🏆
PAE (Orientação Jurídica, Financeira, Psicológica e Social) 🧑‍🎓
Portal de descontos em diversos segmentos (Allya) 🤑
Cartão de crédito PAN com limite diferenciado 💳
Assim como todas as nossas vagas, essa também é destinada à diversidade e inclusão. Independentemente de qualquer fator, perfil ou característica, Eleve sua carreira a PAN !
Para conhecer mais sobre nossos benefícios e cultura, acesse o Trabalhe Conosco:
Acesse também nossa página na Glassdoor e veja nossas avaliações:

Somos o PAN

Ágeis, flexíveis e criativos, exploramos possibilidades com disposição e desejo de fazer acontecer. Sempre prontos para encarar novos desafios, nutrimos líderes que, além de ter garra, são abertos e empáticos, veem na proximidade das relações, o elo entre cada um.

Nossa missão, se faz cumprida quando transformamos a vida dos outros através dos nossos conhecimentos. Nossos pilares de cultura, reforçam nossa postura idealizadora e com desejo de fazer acontecer: T rabalho em equipe, O usadia empreendedora e P rotagonismo com profundidade.

Dominamos nossos processos e trazemos melhorias para quem deseja ter uma vida financeira mais inteligente.

Principais desafios:

  • Coletar e limpar dados financeiros de diversas fontes, incluindo bancos de dados internos e externos
column2: • Realizar consultas SQL para extrair informações relevantes
column3: • Criar dashboards e relatórios executivos usando ferramentas como Tableau
column4: • Colaborar com equipes multidisciplinares para identificar tendências, anomalias e oportunidades de otimização de processos
column5:
• Auxiliar em solicitações de dados ad hoc e contribuir para projetos em andamento.

    • Quais as principais competências para a posição?

    • Formação superior completa: preferencialmente em Engenharia, Ciência da Computação, Estatística, Economia ou áreas relacionadas
column6: • Experiência Técnica: conhecimento moderado ou avançado em SQL para extração e manipulação de dados
column7: • Habilidades Essenciais: Raciocínio lógico, capacidade analítica e criatividade na busca por soluções
column8:
• Comunicação Efetiva: Boa comunicação e habilidades para argumentação técnica e de negócios.

    • Desejável:

    • Criação de Dashboards e Visualizações: Habilidade em criar dashboards e visualizações para acompanhamento de KPIs (Tableau)
column9: • Conhecimento em Cloud: Desejável experiência com plataformas como AWS e Azure
column10: • Análise de Jornadas de Produtos: Experiência em analisar jornadas de produtos, estudar comportamentos e classificar dados
column11: • Conhecimento em produtos financeiros (por exemplo, cartão, conta corrente, consignado)

3913451738,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/analista-de-dados-dados-at-btg-pactual-3913451738?position=8&pageNum=0&refId=X84chee5MOJlSD5x5MMKig%3D%3D&trackingId=c222EcXMlOUoPegK%2Bw0O9Q%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Analista de Dados | Dados,BTG Pactual,"São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil","Sobre a Área

A área de dados do Banco tem crescido a cada dia e temos certeza que ela protagonizará os novos modelos de negócios do banco. Diante dessa grande missão, prezamos por um time de alta qualidade para solucionar importantes desafios.

A posição tem como objetivo compor o time de Data Analytics que trabalha com as mais modernas tecnologias de machine learning, big data e análise de dados, ajudando no dia a dia de diversas áreas do banco.

Você atuará diretamente com uma ou mais das áreas de negócio do banco, implementando e propondo soluções a partir de dados, sejam elas análises, visualizações ou automatizações. Você exercitará muito a habilidade de identificação e solução de problemas

Você transitará entre áreas técnicas e de negócio e deverá ser capaz de se comunicar bem com diferentes tipos de profissionais. É muito importante saber explicar de maneira clara e concisa o resultado de análises complicadas, ou esclarecer para uma equipe tecnológica a exata necessidade de uma área de negócio
Você deve estar preparado para mudanças e alterações de rotina, cada dia será repleto de novos e diferentes desafios.
Preferencialmente formação completa em Engenharia, Economia, Computação ou áreas relacionadas
Experiência alguma ferramenta de visualização de dados tais como Power Bi
Experiência em análises de dados com programação, preferencialmente python
Conhecimento moderado ou avançado de SQL
Disponibilidade para trabalhar no presencial no escritório de São Paulo
Conhecimento técnico sobre Produtos de Investimentos
Conhecimento sobre estatística descritiva e testes de hipótese
Conhecimento em plataformas de cloud, como AWS ou Google Cloud
Conhecimento em tecnologias de Big Data como PySpark e Ni-Fi
Conhecimento em tecnologias de Big Data como Power Query e DAX
Programa de Apoio Pessoal (EAP) Planos por adesão como Previdência Privada e Seguro de Vida.

3972732355,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/analista-de-dados-pl-opera%C3%A7%C3%B5es-at-banco-pan-3972732355?position=9&pageNum=0&refId=X84chee5MOJlSD5x5MMKig%3D%3D&trackingId=fvPVRXO3oOk0BAgc%2FJ8e%2Bw%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Analista de Dados Pl. - Operações,Banco PAN,"São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil","Somos o PAN

Ágeis, flexíveis e criativos, exploramos possibilidades com disposição e desejo de fazer acontecer. Sempre prontos para encarar novos desafios, nutrimos líderes que, além de ter garra, são abertos e empáticos, veem na proximidade das relações, o elo entre cada um.

Nossa missão, se faz cumprida quando transformamos a vida dos outros através dos nossos conhecimentos. Nossos pilares de cultura, reforçam nossa postura idealizadora e com desejo de fazer acontecer: T rabalho em equipe, O usadia empreendedora e P rotagonismo com profundidade.
Dominamos nossos processos e trazemos melhorias para quem deseja ter uma vida financeira mais inteligente.
Desenvolver e manter painéis de monitoramento em Tableau para rastrear KPIs e métricas de desempenho operacional.
Colaborar com as equipes de operações e TI para implementar soluções baseadas em AWS que suportem o monitoramento contínuo das atividades financeiras.
Garantir a integridade e precisão dos dados utilizados nos painéis, realizando testes e validações regularmente.
Fornecer suporte analítico e orientação para as equipes operacionais, ajudando-as a interpretar e agir com base nos insights fornecidos pelos painéis.
Quais as principais competências para a posição?
Experiência na criação e manutenção de painéis de monitoramento em Tableau.
Conhecimento em técnicas de analytics, incluindo modelagem de dados, airflow e SQL
Experiência prática com serviços da AWS
Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e capacidade de colaborar efetivamente com equipes multifuncionais.
Formação em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia, Matemática, Estatística ou área relacionada.
Modelo de atuação: Híbrido (4 dias presencial no escritório e 1 dia de home office)
Convênio Médico (internação em apartamento para titular e dependentes) 🏥
Descontos em mais de 10 mil farmácias 💊
Licença familiar estendida (Responsável 6 meses e corresponsável 30 dias) 👨‍🍼🤱

Programa de reconhecimento por tempo de casa 🏆
PAE (Orientação Jurídica, Financeira, Psicológica e Social) 🧑‍🎓
Portal de descontos em diversos segmentos (Allya) 🤑
Cartão de crédito PAN com limite diferenciado 💳

Somos o PAN

Ágeis, flexíveis e criativos, exploramos possibilidades com disposição e desejo de fazer acontecer. Sempre prontos para encarar novos desafios, nutrimos líderes que, além de ter garra, são abertos e empáticos, veem na proximidade das relações, o elo entre cada um.

Nossa missão, se faz cumprida quando transformamos a vida dos outros através dos nossos conhecimentos. Nossos pilares de cultura, reforçam nossa postura idealizadora e com desejo de fazer acontecer: T rabalho em equipe, O usadia empreendedora e P rotagonismo com profundidade.

Dominamos nossos processos e trazemos melhorias para quem deseja ter uma vida financeira mais inteligente.

Principais desafios:

  • Desenvolver e manter painéis de monitoramento em Tableau para rastrear KPIs e métricas de desempenho operacional.
  • Colaborar com as equipes de operações e TI para implementar soluções baseadas em AWS que suportem o monitoramento contínuo das atividades financeiras.
  • Garantir a integridade e precisão dos dados utilizados nos painéis, realizando testes e validações regularmente.
  • Fornecer suporte analítico e orientação para as equipes operacionais, ajudando-as a interpretar e agir com base nos insights fornecidos pelos painéis.

Quais as principais competências para a posição?

  • Experiência na criação e manutenção de painéis de monitoramento em Tableau.
  • Conhecimento em técnicas de analytics, incluindo modelagem de dados, airflow e SQL
  • Experiência prática com serviços da AWS
  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e capacidade de colaborar efetivamente com equipes multifuncionais.
  • Formação em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia, Matemática, Estatística ou área relacionada.

3983702744,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/analista-de-dados-s%C3%AAnior-at-ita%C3%BA-unibanco-3983702744?position=10&pageNum=0&refId=X84chee5MOJlSD5x5MMKig%3D%3D&trackingId=C6LIhvvSS1Zvqb10fQNXmA%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,Analista de dados sênior,Itaú Unibanco,"São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil","Escopo e Atividades do Dia a Dia:
Coleta de Dados: Identificação e coleta de dados de diversas fontes, incluindo internas e externas.
Limpeza e Preparação de Dados: Garantir a precisão e o formato adequado para análise.
Análise de Dados: Aplicação de técnicas estatísticas para explorar dados, identificando tendências e padrões.
Visualização de Dados: Criação de gráficos e dashboards para facilitar a compreensão das informações.
Relatórios e Comunicação de Resultados: Comunicação eficaz das descobertas para stakeholders.
Formação Acadêmica: Bacharelado em áreas como Ciência da Computação, Estatística, Matemática ou Engenharia.
Experiência Técnica: Mínimo de 2 anos em análise de dados, com proficiência em SQL e programação em Python ou R.
Ferramentas de Análise e Visualização: Experiência com AWS Quicksight, AWS Glue, AWS Sagemaker, Tableau, Power BI, entre outras.
Plataformas de processamento de dados: Apache, Saprk e Hadoop
Soft Skills: Excelentes habilidades de comunicação, proatividade e capacidade de trabalhar em equipe.
Estamos em busca de profissionais apaixonados por dados e inovação. Se você está pronto para acelerar sua carreira em um ambiente desafiador e dinâmico, junte-se a nós!

Escopo e Atividades do Dia a Dia:


  • Coleta de Dados: Identificação e coleta de dados de diversas fontes, incluindo internas e externas.
  • Limpeza e Preparação de Dados: Garantir a precisão e o formato adequado para análise.
  • Análise de Dados: Aplicação de técnicas estatísticas para explorar dados, identificando tendências e padrões.
  • Visualização de Dados: Criação de gráficos e dashboards para facilitar a compreensão das informações.
  • Relatórios e Comunicação de Resultados: Comunicação eficaz das descobertas para stakeholders.


Habilidades e Competências Necessárias:


  • Formação Acadêmica: Bacharelado em áreas como Ciência da Computação, Estatística, Matemática ou Engenharia.
  • Experiência Técnica: Mínimo de 2 anos em análise de dados, com proficiência em SQL e programação em Python ou R.
  • Ferramentas de Análise e Visualização: Experiência com AWS Quicksight, AWS Glue, AWS Sagemaker, Tableau, Power BI, entre outras.
  • Plataformas de processamento de dados: Apache, Saprk e Hadoop
  • Soft Skills: Excelentes habilidades de comunicação, proatividade e capacidade de trabalhar em equipe.


Estamos em busca de profissionais apaixonados por dados e inovação. Se você está pronto para acelerar sua carreira em um ambiente desafiador e dinâmico, junte-se a nós!

3975074363,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/%E2%98%91%EF%B8%8F%F0%9F%91%A9%F0%9F%8F%BD%E2%80%8D%E2%9A%95%EF%B8%8Fpessoa-analista-de-business-intelligence-bi-%0As%C3%A3o-paulo-sp%0Aefetivo-at-interplayers-3975074363?position=14&pageNum=0&refId=X84chee5MOJlSD5x5MMKig%3D%3D&trackingId=7KW75R2vtXeGPh3LBdZ%2Fag%3D%3D&trk=public_jobs_jserp-result_search-card,☑️👩🏽⚕️Pessoa Analista de Business Intelligence (BI) São Paulo - SP Efetivo,Interplayers,"São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil","Descrição da vaga

A InterPlayers é o HUB de Negócios da Saúde e Bem-estar que promove ampla integração com todos os componentes do segmento farmacêutico e hospitalar, com destacada participação no mercado, integrando farmácias, clínicas, hospitais, distribuidores e indústrias em todo território nacional.
Aqui na IP, aprendemos sempre, e nos tornamos cada vez melhores em um ambiente de trabalho saudável, colaborativo e dinâmico!
São muito bem-vindas candidaturas de pessoas negras/pretas, mulheres, indígenas, LGBTQIA+, ou outros grupos menorizados.
Inscreva-se e conheça mais sobre nosso time 💙

O objetivo do cargo de Business Intelligence (BI) é coletar, organizar e analisar dados para ajudar na tomada de decisões estratégicas da área de serviços ao paciente. Isso inclui criar relatórios, dashboards e análises básicas, além de fornecer suporte aos usuários das ferramentas de BI, quando aplicável.
As Principais Atribuições De Um Analista De Business Intelligence (BI) Geralmente Incluem Várias Responsabilidades e Tarefas Dentro Da Área De BI, Sendo
Coletar dados de diferentes fontes da empresa, como bancos de dados, planilhas, sistemas de CRM, etc., e integrá-los em um único ambiente de BI, ou consolidação de relatório.
Analisar dados para identificar tendências, padrões e insights que possam ajudar na tomada de decisão estratégica.

Desenvolver relatórios e dashboards interativos utilizando ferramentas de BI (como Tableau, Power BI, Qlik, etc.) para fornecer informações visuais e acionáveis para os usuários finais, ou outras ferramentas disponíveis para melhor compreensão dos dados solicitados.
Auxiliar na manutenção e otimização de bancos de dados utilizados para armazenamento de dados de BI, garantindo que os dados sejam precisos, acessíveis e estejam bem-organizados.
Prestar suporte técnico e treinamento básico aos usuários finais para ajudá-los a utilizar os relatórios e dashboards de forma eficaz.
Documentar processos, metodologias e modelos de dados para garantir a consistência e a replicabilidade das análises realizadas.
Apoiar o time de gestão e liderança na análise de dados, desenvolvimento e entender os requisitos que atendam às necessidades dos programas.
